title: patita pAvani
sahitya:
patita pAvani paramEshvariyai tudi shei dinam dinamum manamE


anupallavi

  tudi sheyat-tudi sheya mati tarum pati tarum sutantara gati tarum shuddha parAshakti


caraNam    eNNiya kAriyam tiNNamAik-kUDum eLidinil aramporuL inbamum vIDum viNNara sAkSiyum
maNNilam shUDum veTrit-tirukkaLellAm shuTrilum viLaiyADum jIvanil kaLaiyADum
